Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
76% less damage
+3 to maximum endurance charges armour from equipped body armour is doubled
*small ascendancy points* 16% increased maximum life 32% increased armour
gain 15% of missing unreserved life before being hit by an enemy
90% increased strike distance
